sentence.Network_en: He looked at his new customer shiftily.
sentence.Network_cn: 他诡诈地打量着他的新顾客.

sentences.sentence: "he looked at his new customer shiftily"

auth_sentence.content: Strolling past Majorcan beach houses shuttered for the off-season, I spotted a man behaving shiftily in the shade of a palm tree.
